title: Part 1100 - Uniform Procedures For Appeals From Pretrial Findings Of Mental Retardation In Capital Cases
content:
Part 1100 - Uniform Procedures For Appeals From Pretrial Findings Of Mental Retardation In Capital Cases

State Regulations
§ 1100.1 - General
§ 1100.2 - Procedure
§ 1100.3 - Representation by court-assigned counsel in the Appellate Division

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
